text: Va Alloh sumoro az xok va sipas az nutfa ʙijofarid. On goh cufthoi jakdigaraton qaror dod. Hec zane homila namesavad va tavallud namekunad, magar ʙa ilmi U. Va hec solxurdae umre ʙa u doda namesavad va az umri kase cize kam namegardad, cuz on ki hama dar kitoʙi Lavhi Mahfuz navista sudaast. Va ʙesak, in korho ʙar Alloh oson ast
